scripts.bot:configure-custom-stage-var: yarn lint && yarn build && claudia update --custom-stage-var foo --profile claudia
scripts.bot:configure-telegram: yarn lint && yarn build && claudia update --configure-telegram-bot --profile claudia
scripts.bot:create: yarn lint && yarn build && claudia create --region eu-west-3 --api-module build/bot --policies policy --profile claudia
scripts.bot:update:dev: yarn lint && yarn build && claudia update --set-env-from-json secrets-dev.json --profile claudia
scripts.bot:update:prod: yarn lint && yarn build && claudia update --version prod --set-env-from-json secrets-prod.json --profile claudia
scripts.dynamodb:create-table: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name users --attribute-definitions AttributeName=userid,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=userid,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --region eu-west-3 --query TableDescription.TableArn --output text --profile claudia
scripts.lambda:test: yarn build && claudia test-lambda --event event.json --profile claudia
scripts.nuke: yarn clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock
